title: Portal: artifact links for overlay/report/bev with missing reasons

Show explicit missing_reason when artifacts are missing (e.g., bev gated).
Support local filesystem evidence runs and cloud URIs (rendered as links).

Missing artifacts show reasons, not just absence.
Artifact links are safe and only point to allowed locations.
